summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3309, for the improvement of the alley in block 38, Capitol Hill Addition, Division No. 5, being the alley between 19th Avenue North and 20th Avenue North from East Prospect Street to East Highland Drive, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 40979 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
